title: Operativo de la Secretar√≠a de Marina en Sinaloa provoca temor en Sinaloa | Publimetro M√©xico
text: La Secretar√≠a de Marina estableci√≥ un operativo al sur de Culiac√°n, Sinaloa, en loa sindicatura de Pueblos Unidos, en donde los militares se desplegaron por tierra y aire, situaci√≥n que provoc√≥ temor entre la poblaci√≥n y llev√≥ a la suspensi√≥n de clases. Por medio de redes sociales se difundir que desde la madrugada de este jueves se observ√≥ la presencia de los marinos, quienes cercano un rancho en la zona que es considerada de influencia y bati√≥ de Ismael ‚ÄúEl Mayo‚Äù Zambada. Te recomendamos: [Ordenan liberaci√≥n inmediata de ‚ÄòLa Kena‚Äô, l√≠der del C√°rtel del Golfo detenido en NL](https://www.publimetro.com.mx/noticias/2024/02/01/la-kena-ordenan-liberacion-inmediata-de-lider-del-cartel-del-golfo-detenido-en-nl/) Las clases se suspendieron en poblaciones cercanas ante el temor de que se desate un enfrentamiento, como ha sido com√∫n en esos operativos. Por tierra y cielo el operativo en‚Äî Arely Hernandez (@arehc) [#Culiacan] [#Sinaloa]en la sindicatura de Pueblos Unidos, al sur de Culiac√°n‚Ä¶ extraoficialmente se maneja que van por lugarteniente del Mayo [#CartelDeSinaloa]suspenden clases [@PlataformaNmx] [pic.twitter.com/CM16VfhKAD] [February 1, 2024] El gobierno de Sinaloa no emiti√≥ informaci√≥n sobre el operativo, ya que al ser encabezado por fuerzas federales, las autoridades locales no son informadas. Rub√©n Rocha Moya, gobernador de Sinaloa, declar√≥ que en la mesa de seguridad de este jueves participaron militares, pero no le informaron sobre un operativo en Pueblos Unidos. ‚Äî Tribuna Sonora (@TribunaSonora) [#Seguridad]| Este jueves, la Secretar√≠a de Marina (Semar) llev√≥ a cabo un importante operativo en el sur de Culiac√°n, lo que result√≥ en la suspensi√≥n de clases. La movilizaci√≥n se desarroll√≥ en la sindicatura de Pueblos Unidos üö®‚ÄºÔ∏è [pic.twitter.com/jP36tpSsz4] [February 1, 2024]

author: MENAFN
title: Elsewedy, MAFI Join Forces To Build $300M Agricultural Food Complex In Sadat City | MENAFN.COM
text:
( MENAFN - Daily News Egypt) Elsewedy Industrial Development, a subsidiary of Elsewedy Electric, has signed an agreement with MAFI for Agricultural Produce Industries to allocate 154,000 sqm of industrial land in Industria Sadat City. The agreement was signed by Ahmed Elsewedy, President and CEO of Elsewedy Electric and Chairman of Elsewedy Industrial Development, and Ahmed Abou Hashima, Founder and Chairman of MAFI. Mohamed AlKammah, CEO of Elsewedy Industrial Development, and Sherif Tantawy, CEO of MAFI for Agricultural Produce Industries, also attended the ceremony.
Ahmed Elsewedy praised the project for its significant impact on the Egyptian economy. He said that the complex, which is the largest and most diverse of its kind in the Middle East, will export 80% of its products. He also stressed the global competitiveness of the Egyptian industry.
Ahmed Abou Hashima said that the complex will support the Egyptian economy by adding value to local agricultural resources through manufacturing. He expressed his pleasure in working with Elsewedy Industrial Development and said that the complex will use state-of-the-art technology in the agricultural food sector in cooperation with major international companies.
Abou Hashima added that the complex will contribute to balancing Egyptian trade and supporting the economy by exporting 80% of its products. He also said that the project will generate over 7,000 direct and indirect jobs, and help reduce unemployment.
Mohamed AlKammah said that the agricultural products industry will enhance the industrial diversity in Sadat City. He described the project as one of the largest complexes for agricultural products and food in the region.
AlKammah highlighted the expertise of Elsewedy Industrial Development, which has 15 years of experience in building and developing sustainable industrial cities. He also pointed out the importance of Elsewedy Technical Academy, which provides a qualified and trained technical workforce for investors in Elsewedy's industrial cities.
According to the agreement, MAFI will invest about $300m to establish a complex that consists of five plants. The complex will have two of Egypt's largest plants for producing orange concentrates, tomatoes, various fruits, and essential oils. It will also have the Middle East's first Cloudy Products plant and one of the world's largest freeze-drying facilities. Moreover, the complex will have a plant for freezing fruits and vegetables, which will boost the agricultural food industry and increase Egyptian exports of high-quality products worldwide.

author: Michael Hemsworth
title: Off-Grid Solar Energy Units - The 'Iris' Portable Solar Tracker Has an All-in-One Design (TrendHunter.com)
text:
The 'Iris' portable solar tracker is an all-in-one off-grid energy solution engineered with eco power access in mind to help users enjoy energy at their leisure. The unit has an advanced design that consists of a solar panel rated to convert up to 24W and works with tracking technology to follow the path of the sun throughout the day to maximize charging. The unit holds a 270Wh battery in the base that will provide up to 20 charges for certain smartphone models, two to three charges for laptops and much more.
The 'Iris' portable solar tracker is constructed with a weather-resistant design that's suitable for use in any conditions to ensure rain or snow won't affect its ability to perform.
The 'Iris' Portable Solar Tracker Has an All-in-One Design
[Michael Hemsworth](/Michael.Hemsworth)‚Äî October 3, 2024 ‚Äî
[Eco](/eco)

kickstarter&gadgetifyTrend Themes
1. Portable Green Energy - An increasing number of individuals and businesses are turning to compact, self-contained solar energy solutions like the 'Iris' Portable Solar Tracker to reduce reliance on traditional power grids.
2. Solar Tracking Technology - Innovative solar panel systems that incorporate tracking technology to follow the sun's path are emerging, significantly enhancing energy efficiency and maximizing power generation.
3. Weather-resistant Energy Devices - The demand for durable, weatherproof renewable energy units is rising, catering to users who require reliable performance in various environmental conditions.
Industry Implications
1. Renewable Energy - The renewable energy sector is integrating advanced tracking technologies to offer more efficient and user-friendly solar power solutions.
2. Outdoor Gear - Manufacturers of outdoor and adventure gear are increasingly embedding solar power capabilities into their designs, meeting the needs of off-grid enthusiasts and remote workers.
3. Consumer Electronics - The development of portable, high-capacity solar-powered devices is providing new opportunities for the consumer electronics market, enhancing device longevity and user convenience.

author: Spencer Mahon smahon@richmondregister.com
title: Berea native nominated Armed Forces Insurance Military Spouse of the year
text: Berea native and former service member Jerad Knight has been nominated by peers for a special award. Knight has been nominated for the Armed Forces Insurance Military Spouse of the Year. ‚ÄùThe Armed Forces Insurance Military Spouse of the Year (AFI MSOY) award was founded in 2008 to honor military spouses from all branches of service,‚Äù the press release stated. ‚ÄúMore than one million military spouses support and maintain the home front while our service members defend this great nation.‚Äù Knight served his country and towards the end of his service in Washington D.C., that‚Äôs where and when he met his now husband. ‚ÄùWe used to joke that he would convert me to ‚Äòmil-spouse,‚Äô‚Äù he said to AFI in a more in-depth discussion on their website. ‚ÄúWe have traveled the world and really made a great life. I have had the pleasure of meeting so many other spouses and really making strong bonds within our diverse and amazing community.‚Äù Knight, according to his LinkedIn, is an advocate for the male spouse community and LGBTQIA+ Service members and their families unique struggles in community building. Knight says he‚Äôs also a big advocate for mental and emotional health. ‚ÄùThe service and support you give to yourself is just as important as the care and service you give others,‚Äù he said. Several people nominated Jerad out the many mil-spouses at Buckley Space Force Base. ‚ÄùI met Jerad last year at MSOY Week and immediately knew I had a friend for life. Jerad‚Äôs love for Ohana Homefront Foundation is amazing. The way he advocates for OHF warms my heart. Jerad is an amazing man. He loves his awesome husband, foundation, (the award), and country. He definitely deserves this nomination,‚Äù one nomination said. To check out more on this competition, visit [https://msoy.afi.org/](https://msoy.afi.org/). First round voting begins on Feb. 4.

title: Allemagne. La police en alerte apr√®s un ¬´ avis de danger ¬ª √† la cath√©drale de Cologne

Suite √† un ¬´ avis de danger ¬ª √©mis pour la Saint-Sylvestre, la police allemande a indiqu√© r√©aliser des fouilles dans la cath√©drale de Cologne (ouest) avec des chiens renifleurs, ce samedi soir. Contr√¥le strict des visiteurs ¬´ M√™me si l'information se rapporte √† la Saint-Sylvestre, nous allons d√®s ce soir tout mettre en ≈ìuvre pour assurer la s√©curit√© des visiteurs de la cath√©drale la veille de No√´l ¬ª, a d√©clar√© le chef de la police de Cologne, Michael Esser. ¬´ Dimanche, tous les visiteurs seront soumis √† un contr√¥le avant d'entrer dans le lieu de culte ¬ª, est-il pr√©cis√© dans le communiqu√©. ¬´ La police et le chapitre de la cath√©drale recommandent de renoncer aux sacs et d'arriver t√¥t aux messes ¬ª, est-il encore √©crit. Menace d'attentat en Autriche, Allemagne et Espagne Le quotidien allemand Bild affirme sur son site internet que des services de s√©curit√© en Autriche, Allemagne et Espagne ont re√ßu des indications selon lesquelles un groupe islamiste voudrait commettre plusieurs attentats en Europe possiblement √† la Saint-Sylvestre et √† No√´l.
